EmailTemplate.subject: Receipt of PCI DSS Confirmation - {!AMS_OSCAR__c.IATACode__c} - {!AMS_OSCAR__c.Account__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
IATA Code: {!AMS_OSCAR__c.IATACode__c}
This is to inform you that we have received your PCI DSS Attestation of Compliance / Nil Credit Card Self-Declaration and that our records have been updated accordingly.
We want to take this opportunity to thank you for having submitted the requested evidence within the deadline.
We would like to remind you that your PCI DSS Attestation of Compliance has an expiration date and therefore it has to be renewed on annual basis.
Should you need any further information from IATA, please do not hesitate to login a new query via our Customer Portal: www.iata.org/cs.
Yours sincerely,
Agency Management International Air Transport Association ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- In order to obtain information or assistance from IATA, do not hesitate to access at any time our Customer Portal
